Description: Calcite alabastron with flat base and flaring sides, becoming convex to form shoulder, fluted neck with everted ledge-rim.
Excavator/field collector: Excavated by: Dr David George Hogarth
Bibliographic references: Zitman 2010 / The necropolis of Assiut: a case study of local Egyptian funerary culture from the Old Kingdom to the end of the Middle Kingdom (I, 88)
